name: Nuke No No
description:
Alert! Alert! The high command has detected an incoming nuke heading towards the city! You are tasked to delay the nuke as long as you can using your cannon. Power ups will be dispatched to your location so hold on as long as you can!

CREDITS

-Game Designer - Sean Matthew

-Game Programmer - Sean Matthew

-2D Artist - C. Gerardito, Riska

-Sound Engineer - C. Gerardito, C. Vincent Welax
